feed.title: FRidh's blog - school
feed.subtitle: Discovery consists of seeing what everybody has seen and thinking what nobody has thought -- Albert Szent-Gyorgyi

entry.title: Article about my 2009 internship project
entry.content: In 2009 I had an internship in DGMR and developed an acoustic measuring system, as I described a bit here. After my internship I continued working on this project. Now an article has appeared about it in 'Technisch Weekblad' and at their website.
